alert.note: Alert for Caribou (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 23 at 11:59AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Blackfoot River above Blackfoot Reservoir near Henry affecting Caribou County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Blackfoot River above Blackfoot Reservoir near Henry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.7 feet, Blackfoot River above the reservoir into the highland may be approaching bankfull in some locations. Some ponding possible in low-lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 4.7 feet. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Blackfoot River Blackfoot Reservoir near Hen 5.5 5.1 Tue 11 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to the National Weather Service in Pocatello when you can do so safely.
